events.text: I’m VIA, your Virtual Interactive Assistant!
I’m here to help you navigate Birdz Browser, a place where you can interact and form connections with people all across the world.
No matter where they might be, so long as they’re also using VIA, new friends are just a click away!
Here, you see that our websites are organized into “nests”. By clicking and dragging the screen around, you can click on different nest icons and see what’s in the area!
